page.title: 13PLAYGROUND GAMES2, GATESHEAD
page.content: {ORANGES AND LEMONS }Two children make an arch and the other children pass under and sing. It is about a lady selling fruit in the street a long time ago. Someone bought some but couldn't pay. His head was chopped off and all the churches rang their bells. {DUSTY BLUEBELLS}The children form a ring holding hands. One child goes in and out and then stops to tap someone on the shoulder. They gradually make a chain. Everyone sings "In and out the dusty bluebells...." {WALLFLOWERS}Children make a ring and sing "Wallflowers, wallflowers growing up so high".One child is then elected to turn around until eventually everyone has done so.
